infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to take photos for notes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to upload images and videos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs microphone access to record videos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Notes to access your photos.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Notes to access your camera.
